import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ImageCarousel from './ImageCarousel'; const itemsData = { category: "", details: "", location: "" }; export default function AddItem() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState(itemsData); let slides = [ "https://i.pinimg.com/originals/51/82/ac/5182ac536727d576c78a9320ac62de30.jpg", "https://wallpapercave.com/wp/wp3386769.jpg", "https://wallpaperaccess.com/full/809523.jpg", "https://getwallpapers.com/wallpaper/full/5/c/0/606489.jpg", ]; const onChange = (e) => { setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value }); }; const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission here, for example: console.log(formData); // Log the form data // You can send formData to the backend or perform other actions here dispatch(); }; return ( <>
); }
